channel.title: Compiling error
channel.description:
For some reason, Idk why this started, but now everytime i try to special attack on a npc, any weapon, this happens in the server console,
[code][1/26/12 8:44 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 495 [1/26/12 8:44 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.activateSpecial( CombatAssistant.java:2989) [1/26/12 8:44 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.attackNpc(Combat Assistant.java:278) [1/26/12 8:44 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:2100)
[1/26/12 8:44 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:142) [1/26/12 8:44 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:194)[/code]
If someone could help solve this issue, that would be great. thanks.

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @pkufast pkufast
item.description:
@pkufast wrote:

Brandontan:

okay in your activate special method in your combat assistant is effed up, see if you can back it up from the source that you dled it from, this will work for you but it may change the spec accuracys back.

Okay i will try that. Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Well, whatever you changed in CombatAssistant obviously interfered with special attacks. Try undoing what you did and see if it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @pkufast pkufast
item.description:
@pkufast wrote:

nope, thats the thing, it used to let me use special with any weapon on npcs, but now. its liek some fucking wizard in my computer, magically did something. It pisses me off bad.

However, the only thing i did in combat assistant, which wouldnt have any affect on this, Is change the spec accuracys on some weapons. Which does not have any affect on this, And i use eclipse. So idk wtf. And its actually not the compiling, its when im on the server, try to spec, and in the server console, ^ that shit pops up, and doesnt let me use weapon special. No one can now. Its pissing me off.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

be more in depth, did you change anything in the file combat assistant?

Read full topic
